name: Loopsie-pld
description:
You can use Arrow keys to turn left or right.

Fixed & Improved version of LudumDare47 game.
https://eayyildiz.itch.io/loopsie

Please give feedback and vote: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loopsie An Infinite runner game with procedurally generated levels. If you make bad decisions you get stuck in loop then character immediately run from the beginning.

Music: Manuel F. Graf, www.manuelgraf.com
https://freesound.org/people/yummie/packs/23103/
